dji.sdk.api.RemoteController

Class DJIRemoteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dji.sdk.api.RemoteController.DJIRemoteController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DJIInspireRemoteController

    public class DJIRemoteController
extends java.lang.Object

    DJI Remote Controller

    The DJIRemoteController is the remote controller object of drone. You could access this class by using DJIDrone.getDjiRemoteController(). As the base class of remote controller, the DJIRemoteController abstracts the basic functions of remote controller, such as setting the sensitivity of wheel, controlling pith & roll & yaw speed, pairing remote controller and the drone.

    DJIRemoteController could also provide the information about the communication strength between drone and remote controller. In addition, the developers could provide suitable controlling mode for customers to satisfy the difference preference.
    Version:
    : V2.4.0
    Author:
    : DJI Software
